title: My Good Life - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Mystery   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Adventurers   Beast Companions   Bickering Couple   Fearless Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Quiet Characters   Shapeshifters   Slow Romance   Vampires   Zombies
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description:
Su Xiaoxin, a comic book author didn’t make a penny out of it. But it all changed when she moved to this eight-story, old residential building. Her readers with the manuscript fees took a sudden leap.

The readers praised her vivid imagination…

But in fact, there was no imagination in her comics…

She drew her real life!

Vampires, zombies, corpses and elves are not from her imagination, but sitting face to face with her, they ate a hot pot!>
